page.title: 08COWBIT PLAYING FIELD
page.content: In 1978 the playing field was given by Jack Holmes, it is 95m by 150m.The grass is cut once a week between May and October.In 1979 the childrens swings were put up and people can play tennis, voley ball, football, netball high-jump and long-jump. On Sunday morning Cowbit play football matches and train on Wednesday nights. Once a year there is a Super Stars competition in which there are 10 events and each person enters 8 of them.They are: 100m race, rifle shooting, obstacle race, horseshoe throwing, long jump, shot put, arm wrestling, gym tests, netball and long distance running. The trophies are awarded on points and cups are awarded.This year there were few entrants but everyone enjoyed the afternoon.
